content: petals of 10 sts round 10 slip_stitch over 1 st chain 2 double_crochet in next 3 sts large shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 4 sts large shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat 11 times join 12 petals of 12 sts round 11 slip_stitch over 1 st chain 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts small shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts small shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts repeat 11 times join 12 petals of 12 sts round 12 slip_stitch over 1 st chain 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts large shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts large shell in ch2 space double_crochet in next 5 sts repeat 11 times join 12 petals of 14 sts you may continue on in pattern one round large shells next round of small shells next round large shells or end here snuggle will be about 17 inches across final round slip_stitch over 1 st chain 1 single_crochet in each st until chain 2 space 2 single_crochet ch1 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space single_crochet in each remaining st skipping the last st of this petal and the first st of the next petal join weave in ends variation use back loop double_crochet stitches for texture either in flower center on petals or both when doing back loop double_crochet on the petals you can continue to crochet into the chain 2 spaces or crochet the first part of each shell into the back loop of the first chain and the second part into the back loop of the second chain back loop double_crochet petals variation
